name: Moroccan Harira Soup
steps: Sauté onions and garlic in olive oil until soft and translucent.
If using meat, add it and brown it, then add tomatoes, lentils and chickpeas.
Cover with water or broth, season with spices, and simmer until legumes (and meat, if used) are tender.
Chop cilantro and parsley; add them toward the end of cooking for freshness.
description: Hearty and nourishing Moroccan soup — perfect for gatherings or Ramadan.
